channel.title: Out Here on the Farm
channel.itunes:author: Sonja Arnold
channel.itunes:summary: Out Here On The Farm is a collection of inspirational, motivational stories taken from the bible and life experiences. The podcast ran from September 14, 2020 through July 30, 2023. All episodes written by Sonja Arnold. All episodes edited, mixed, and produced by Kevin Hartnell. Theme music for episodes 1-32 by Jason Shaw. Theme music for episodes 33-117 by Joe Bartoldus. Original score for all three Halloween specials (episodes 007b "Monster Hunting," 059b "Seen and Unseen Mysteries," and 100 "Night Fright") by Kevin Hartnell.
channel.description: Out Here On The Farm is a collection of inspirational, motivational stories taken from the bible and life experiences. The podcast ran from September 14, 2020 through July 30, 2023.

item.title: 001. Storyteller
item.description: In the first episode, Sonja recalls fond memories of her father, a great storyteller.
